name: Veggie Pong
description:
Control either a bunny or a mole and defeat your friends in this Pong based game!
Utilize the arrows and the Z and X keys to navigate the main menu.

This game was created as a programming class project for Universidade Anhembi Morumbi's game design course utilizing Processing.

Music: Spy Hunter & 8-bit-Arcade4 @ dl-sounds.com
